DOC.brief_summary: A prospective phase I consecutive phase II , twoarm , randomize multi-center trial temsirolimus combination pioglitazone , etoricoxib metronomic low-dose trofosfamide versus dacarbazine ( DTIC ) patient advance melanoma Phase I : To determine dose temsirolimus use phase II part study Phase II : To determine overall survival Secondary objective - To evalulate response rate - To evaluate time progression ( TTP ) - To evalulate time partial response ( time PR well ) ( TPR ) - To evaluate quality life - To evaluate tolerability safety
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Consecutive Phase II , Two-arm , Randomized Multi-center Trial Patients With Advanced Melanoma
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Must able adhere study visit schedule protocol requirement . BRAF V600 mutation analysis Sufficient bone marrow function : neutrophil ≥ 2x109/l , hemoglobin ≥10 g/dl , platelet ≥ 100x109/l Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status score 0 , 1 , 2 ( see Post Text Supplement 3 ) . Required laboratory result : 1 . Liver function : Total bilirubin < 1.5 time upper limit local institution ( ULN ) , SGPT , SGOT ≤ 2.5 time upper limit local institution 2 . Renal function : serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 ULN 3 .
